page.description: Gets properties of an item in storage.
page.syntax: P itemProperties = a5Storage_getItemProperties(C connectionString , C itemName)

argument.name: connectionString
argument.description: Storage connection string with ::storage:: as a prefix.

argument.name: pResult
argument.description: an optional dot variable that you can pass in that will be populated with information about the object.

section.description: Returns a dot variable with these properties

case.description: AbsolutePath - the URL to the item
ContentType - the content type of the item
ModifiedTime - time item was last modified
item = a dot variable with a pointer to the item object. This object exposes various methods and properties of the item.
